description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of notes in an Android application. It manages note rendering, item click handling, and view binding.

classes.name: NoteListAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of notes, handling data updates and item clicks.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder class that binds note data to RecyclerView item views and manages user interactions at item level.

methods.name: submitList
methods.description: Updates the adapter with a new list of notes and refreshes the view.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and returns a new NoteViewHolder instance for an item view.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a note to the ViewHolder for display.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of notes in the list.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object to the UI components within the ViewHolder.

methods.name: snippet
methods.description: Generates a shortened summary of the note content for display.
